医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
简化测试可有效预测癌症患者的吸烟成瘾来自近 6000 名患有癌症的吸烟者的数据表明，预测谁会戒烟可能比之前想象的更容易。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240812/Simplified-test- effective-in-predicting-smoking-addiction-in-cancer-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240812/Simplified-test- effective-in-predicting-smoking-addiction-in-cancer-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=99d8be89-c999-4944-8550-447b8be27f35 Mon, 12 Aug 2024 12:19:17 -0400 Simplified test effective in predicting smoking addiction in cancer patients
研究表明父母的饮食习惯直接影响孩子的饮食行为阿斯顿大学的研究表明，幼儿经常表现出与父母相似的饮食行为，父母自己的饮食方式会影响他们喂养孩子的方式。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240812/Research-shows-parents-eating-habits-directly-influence-childrens-eating-behavior.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240812/Research-shows-parents-eating-habits-directly-influence-childrens-eating-behavior.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f1113478-ab41-4f67-af95-2b57edfb6459 Mon, 12 Aug 2024 12:12:52 -0400 Research shows parents' eating habits directly influence children's eating behavior
儿童和青少年含糖饮料消费的全球趋势研究人员调查了 1990 年至 2018 年间儿童和青少年的含糖饮料消费趋势。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240812/Global-trends-in-sugar-sweetened-beverage-conspiration-among-children-and-adolescents.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240812/Global-trends-in-sugar-sweetened-beverage-conspiration-among-children-and-adolescents.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e29a92a6-51a6-4e1c-9f86-d70106b0026b Mon, 12 Aug 2024 10:37:00 -0400 Global trends in sugar-sweetened beverage consumption among children and adolescents
大麻使用障碍会增加患头颈癌的风险吗？研究人员确定大麻使用障碍是否会增加患头颈癌的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240812/Does-cannabis-use-disorder-increase-the-risk-of-head-and-neck-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240812/Does-cannabis-use-disorder-increase-the-risk-of-head-and-neck-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=611cc70f-5a58-4aa7-9119-cf5df37ed1f8 Mon, 12 Aug 2024 10:29:00 -0400 Does cannabis use disorder increase the risk of head and neck cancer?
新药 GSM-15606 可预防空气污染造成的阿尔茨海默病风险南加州大学伦纳德·戴维斯老年学学院领导的一项新研究表明，给小鼠喂食一种名为 GSM-15606 的药物可以防止与空气污染相关的与阿尔茨海默病相关的蛋白质增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240812/New-drug-GSM-15606-may-guard-against-Alzheimers-risk-from-air-pollution.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240812/New-drug-GSM-15606-may-guard-against-Alzheimers-risk-from-air-pollution.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b74e16ee-2b00-427b-9268-e305a855387d Mon, 12 Aug 2024 10:25:50 -0400 New drug GSM-15606 may guard against Alzheimer's risk from air pollution
研究显示西密歇根州农村地区轻度认知障碍的未确诊率很高Corewell Health™ 和密歇根州立大学的研究人员在该州率先使用超过 150 万名患者的去识别化电子健康记录来分析西部农村和城市地区轻度认知障碍 (MCI) 的发病率和风险因素密歇根州。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240812/Study-reveals-high-undiagnosed-rates-of-mild-cognitive-impairment-in-rural-West-Michigan.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240812/Study-reveals-high-undiagnosed-rates-of-mild-cognitive-impairment-in-rural-West-Michigan.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6296ccd2-97f2-4737-99e1-a718d7cab0a7 Mon, 12 Aug 2024 10:18:41 -0400 Study reveals high undiagnosed rates of mild cognitive impairment in rural West Michigan
MRI 扫描显示出通过预测心力衰竭风险来取代侵入性心脏测试的潜力核磁共振扫描可以取代侵入性心脏测试，因为新的研究表明，它们可以可靠地估计心脏内的压力，以预测患者是否会出现心力衰竭。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240812/MRI-scans-show-pottial-to-replace-侵袭性-heart-tests-by-predicting-heart-failure-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240812/MRI-scans-show-pottial-to-replace- Invasive-heart-tests-by-predicting-heart-failure-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=40f7a2e9-73d0-48f3-a975-76added909bd Mon, 12 Aug 2024 10:02:00 -0400 MRI scans show potential to replace invasive heart tests by predicting heart failure risk
新研究强调男性癌症负担日益增加以及全球健康公平的迫切需要在对男性 30 种癌症类型的分析中，研究人员发现，按年龄和国家经济状况划分的癌症病例和死亡人数存在巨大差异，预计到 2050 年，这种差异将进一步扩大。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240812/New-research-highlights-forming-cancer-burden-for-men-and-urgent-need-for-global-health-equity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240812/New-research-highlights-forming-cancer-burden-for-men-and-urgent-need-for-global-health-equity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e2ccea8d-f18c-4b4b-9704-c82b944b19f3 Mon, 12 Aug 2024 09:54:45 -0400 New research highlights growing cancer burden for men and urgent need for global health equity
心脏肉瘤诊断和治疗的关键见解宣布在《心血管创新与应用》杂志上发表新文章。心脏肉瘤以其罕见性和侵袭性为特征，给诊断和治疗带来了巨大的挑战。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240812/Key-insights-on-diagnosis-and-treatment-of-cardiac-sarcomas.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240812/Key-insights-on-diagnosis-and-treatment-of-cardiac-sarcomas.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4b6db0de-3279-4577-8d5b-58ffb3f61967 Mon, 12 Aug 2024 09:38:00 -0400 Key insights on diagnosis and treatment of cardiac sarcomas
研究显示青少年糖消费量下降，但水平仍高于世卫组织指导方针高糖饮食被视为肥胖和慢性病的危险因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240812/Study-shows-decline-in-sugar-conspiration-among-youth-but-levels-remain-above-WHO-guidelines.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240812/Study-shows-decline-in-sugar-conspiration-among-youth-but-levels-remain-above-WHO-guidelines.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b6cf8b9c-7b4f-4307-88a3-881cbab19a89 Mon, 12 Aug 2024 09:05:43 -0400 Study shows decline in sugar consumption among youth but levels remain above WHO guidelines
